I have grabbed the Drill maps from the perfect guide:

Trigonon
Gapuka
Ugalu
Erips
Dendron
Kawrea

By GM on Friday, August 27, 2010 - 03:10 pm:

By fiffa46 on Friday, August 27, 2010 - 06:27 pm:

By Mal'akh on Saturday, August 28, 2010 - 04:27 am:


I wonder why they didn’t highlight the 3 x 3 in
Kawrea.

By Thorr on Saturday, August 28, 2010 - 09:11 am:

Excellent find? I scanned them myself...


And yeah, I don;t know why they didn;t highlight the 3x3. It's complete awesomeness.

The other great place is Dendron in the Winter. If you look at the map, you can stay within 6 spaces of the start. If you take the left road - 2 spaces, then right 2 spaces, then left 2 spaces to the dead end - there are 4 positive spaces, 1 mystery, and 1 bad space. You can walk these 6 spaces back and forth right from the get-go. It's awesome to build up your defense.

By jamesccg on Sunday, August 29, 2010 - 08:36 pm:

What does the red outline boxed mean?

By Mal'akh on Monday, August 30, 2010 - 01:02 am:


Jamesccg: The red outline denotes a
particularly good area to go around or back-and-
forth when on the map.

Thorr: Yeah, I use that area a lot too. That's
why my Pooch and Lobearta have
Defense as their highest stats (since I haven't
unlocked Kawrea in my new game).

By Thorr on Monday, August 30, 2010 - 04:31 pm:

FYI - The Katakana labels at those red boxes would appear to say "Awesome Points"
